mapper.update: UPDATE MEMBER SET M_LEVEL = CASE WHEN M_TOTAL BETWEEN 0 AND 299999 THEN 2 WHEN M_TOTAL BETWEEN 300000 AND 499999 THEN 3 WHEN M_TOTAL BETWEEN 500000 AND 699999 THEN 4 ELSE 5 END WHERE M_ID=#{m_id}
UPDATE PRODUCT SET P_STATUS='대여가능' WHERE P_NO=#{p_no}
mapper.select: SELECT M_LEVEL FROM MEMBER WHERE M_ID=#{m_id}
SELECT NVL(COUNT(*), 0) FROM MEMBER_COUPON MC, COUPON C WHERE MC.CP_NO = C.CP_NO AND MC.M_ID=#{m_id} AND C.CP_NO BETWEEN 1 AND 12
SELECT CP_NO, CP_CATEGORY, CP_NAME, CP_AMOUNT, CP_LIMITMIN, CP_LIMITMAX, CP_USE FROM COUPON WHERE CP_NO BETWEEN 4 AND 6
SELECT CP_NO, CP_CATEGORY, CP_NAME, CP_AMOUNT, CP_LIMITMIN, CP_LIMITMAX, CP_USE FROM COUPON WHERE CP_NO BETWEEN 7 AND 9
SELECT CP_NO, CP_CATEGORY, CP_NAME, CP_AMOUNT, CP_LIMITMIN, CP_LIMITMAX, CP_USE FROM COUPON WHERE CP_NO BETWEEN 10 AND 12
